name: FUNKY PUNCH: Free Style
description:
Battle it out for FREE in FUNKY PUNCH: Free Style with 4 fighters of the Funky Punch Crew right now on your iPhone of iPod Touch. Learn the Funky Moves in Basic Training and Practice modes. Then compete in dynamic funky combat with adjustable difficulty from "NORMAL" to "CRAZY HARD". What are you waiting for? It's 3D, it's FUNKY, and it's FREE right on your iphone/ipod touch.

**PLEASE NOTE** If FUNKY PUNCH: FREE STYLE fails to run you need to rebooting by holding the power button in the upper right top for 8-10 seconds.

**PLEASE NOTE*** If you are still having problems update your iPhone to 2.1. http://www.apple.com/iphone/softwareupdate/
